content: Great read. I think a key thing is missing from our educational system. We worry about facts, tests, and grades, but we never talk about purpose. It is not until we discover what we love, what we truly care about that we can truly succeed. So much emphasis is placed on wealth, that we fail to realize that wealth is empty without purpose. Usually, wealth comes to those that live for what they do. They make a difference. They leave a legacy. It is never about the money.
